title: Online - Ben Smith Blueprint
notes: Looking for an online program? The Blueprint is Ben Smithâ€™s personal daily programming. Whether you are an aspiring CrossFit athlete, an everyday CrossFit athlete, workout from home, or an Affiliate looking to follow a proven programming structure designed to improve overall fitness (a balance between strength, gymnastics skills, olympic lifting, running, rowing, and other endurance work), we have the programming for you!
